title: KHR_materials_sheen glTF extension
description: glTF extension that defines the sheen material model.

sheenColorFactor.description: Color of the sheen layer (in linear space).

sheenColorTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The sheen color (RGB) texture. Stored in channel RGB, the sheen color is in sRGB transfer function.

sheenRoughnessFactor.gltf_detailedDescription: The sheen layer roughness of the material.

sheenRoughnessTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The sheen roughness (Alpha) texture. Stored in alpha channel, the roughness value is in linear space.
